Text: RE Zargon Oil GasPST Ryan and Chris the last payments we made to Zargon were on January These were for January gas options VH and in Canadian dollars and for December oil swap QD in US dollars We have not been able to invoice the oil swap for January as we will not have NXAVCPROMPT until early Feb Call me if you need more info Original Message From Watt Ryan Sent Thursday January PM To Scott Laura Cc Dorland Chris Subject Zargon Oil Gas Hi Laura Chris and I are working on the Zargon termination calculations and we need to know what we owe them or what they owe us as of today I think we owe them money for some Crude Oil put options we sold them but need just wanted to confirm Thanks Ryan

RE Strictly ConfidentialOriginal Message From Milnthorp Rob Sent Tuesday November AM To Scott Laura Subject Strictly Confidential Laura I need in US Dollars income stmts dating back to through to Oct They should show gross margin and EBIT Thanksrob

LavoratoJohn the Compensation number is the approximate grossup you were getting on all your paycheques The Phantom stock taxable benefit is the tax on stock issued in that was unvested at yearend The value is calculated as Units issued units US share price on date issued Discount on stock price for volatility US share price after discount FX rate Cdn share price Value of taxable benefit John you need to talk to your tax advisors regarding this stock When you leave a country you are deemed to dispose of assets at Fair Market Value I dont know what value would be put on this stock by both the Cdn and US taxation authorities as they had not vested at date of departure Forwarded by Laura E ScottCALECT on PM Patricia Henry AM To Laura E CT cc Subject Lavorato Laura here is the breakdown for T items Regular pay box Bonus box Incentive pay box Signon bonus box Retention bonus box ComSer allowance box Compensaion box Vacation pay box Phantom stock tb box box Co match nonreg box box Stock options tb box box AHC family tb box box Parking tb box box Life insur tb box box Dependent life tb box box box total Stock optn ded box Pension box United way box So as you can see John did have taxable income of mm even though not all of it was actual cash in his pocket I think that boxes and through most people because they dont realize that those numbers are included in box If you need more info please let me know Tricia

Lavorato Forwarded by Laura E ScottCALECT on AM Patricia Henry AM To Laura E CT cc Subject Lavorato Laura here is the breakdown for T items Regular pay box Bonus box Incentive pay box Signon bonus box Retention bonus box ComSer allowance box Compensaion box Vacation pay box Phantom stock tb box box Co match nonreg box box Stock options tb box box AHC family tb box box Parking tb box box Life insur tb box box Dependent life tb box box box total Stock optn ded box Pension box United way box So as you can see John did have taxable income of mm even though not all of it was actual cash in his pocket I think that boxes and through most people because they dont realize that those numbers are included in box If you need more info please let me know Tricia

Re Congratulationsto you as well Sally It is very encouraging to see a female Managing Director All the best Enron North America Corp From Sally Beck PM To Laura E CT cc Subject Congratulations Congratulations on your promotion to Vice President Well deserved and a nice recognition of your contributions to the success of the Calgary office Sally

Re Congratulationsto you as well Sally It is very encouraging to see a female Managing Director All the best Enron North America Corp From Sally Beck PM To Laura E CT cc Subject Congratulations Congratulations on your promotion to Vice President Well deserved and a nice recognition of your contributions to the success of the Calgary office Sally

REpst Wes thought it was a good idea so Ive changed my flight to go home Tuesday afternoon I think it will help me to better understand the new expectations Original Message From Beck Sally Sent Friday January PM To Scott Laura Subject RE Dont know what works best with your schedule Ernie Pitterelli head of Operatins for UBS Americas will be here on Monday and Tuesday and one of the things that we will discuss is the risk roles position rerporting and calculation of PL Ernie is targeting Tuesday to discuss Canadian operations so it could be helpful for you to be here What was Wes response Sally Original Message From Scott Laura Sent Thursday January AM To Beck Sally Cc Colwell Wes Subject Sally I was planning on going home tomorrow but Peggy just informed me that she was coming down on Monday and Tuesday to discuss settlements and risk Do you think I should plan on being here for that also

Cc Sally I was planning on going home tomorrow but Peggy just informed me that she was coming down on Monday and Tuesday to discuss settlements and risk Do you think I should plan on being here for that also

Re Congratulationsto you as well Sally It is very encouraging to see a female Managing Director All the best Enron North America Corp From Sally Beck PM To Laura E CT cc Subject Congratulations Congratulations on your promotion to Vice President Well deserved and a nice recognition of your contributions to the success of the Calgary office Sally

REPST Send us a cheque and we will give you screen Hope the move went well and youre not sweltering too badly in Houston Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Wednesday August PM To Scott Laura Subject Hi Laura I hope all is going well The reason for my note is that I was wondered if you can still do the occasional currency swap for employees Id like to convert C thousand and was wondering if I could pay the Enron fee rather than retail Hit them down the middle Jon

Wire Instructions Cc Cdn on Friday Sept to Balancing Pool Toronto Dominion Bank Transit Account Also please wire Cdn to Enron Canada Corp as per the wire instructions in the attached file Please call me tomorrow at to confirm that the money has left your account Forwarded by Laura E ScottCALECT on AM Soma Ghosh AM To Fleming Blair BLAIR OYALBANKCOM Ellison Mike McArthur Ian IAN OYALBANKCOM cc Brian CT Catherine CT Sara CT Laura E CT Robin CT Derek CT Sara CT Peter CT Pushkar CT Subject Please would you please provide a name within RBC for our Treasury group to contact re transfer of funds The full amount will be C interest rate swap cashflows will require readjustment Mike E has asked that these be forwarded to TracyRBC internal Legal for interest rate schedule We would like C to be transferred directly to Govt of Alberta on behalf of Enron Canada Power C to Enron Canada Full detailed instructions will be provided by Laura Scott tel As discussed with Mike the interst rate swap will be fixed Thursday afternoon funds transferred early on Friday Regards Soma
